headline: Ask HN: Vlang vs. Zig vs. Dlang vs. Assemblyscript vs. Haxe vs. EC
description:
All emotions aside, want pros and cons opinion from people who actually did something in below programming languages and have 2+ years of dev experience in general

https://ec-lang.org/

https://vlang.io/

https://haxe.org/

https://www.assemblyscript.org/ (+wasm2c)

https://ziglang.org/
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Vlang vs. Zig vs. Dlang vs. Assemblyscript vs. Haxe vs. EC
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Vlang vs. Zig vs. Dlang vs. Assemblyscript vs. Haxe vs. EC
description_zh-Hans:
抛开所有的情绪，希望真正在以下编程语言中做过事的人提供利弊意见，并且有2年以上的开发经验，一般来说

https://ec-lang.org/

https://vlang.io/

https://haxe.org/

https://www.assemblyscript.org/（+wasm2c）

https://ziglang.org/
description_zh-Hant:
拋開所有的情緒，希望真正在以下編程語言中做過事的人提供利弊意見，並且有2年以上的開發經驗，一般來說

https://ec-lang.org/

https://vlang.io/

https://haxe.org/

https://www.assemblyscript.org/（+wasm2c）

https://ziglang.org/
